What is fire_Ball.py?

I wrote this script when I was at highschool xD. If you wonder script details, you can find script’s github page. Script includes following features.

  • Basic WebSite Cloner
  • Create Actual Proxy List [ONLINE]
  • E-mail Bomber
  • Who Is IP LookUP [ONLINE]
  • MD5 Cracker [ONLINE]
  • Link Extractor [ONLINE]
  • Name Query [ONLINE]
  • Exploit-DB Exploits And Details [ONLINE]
